programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: A Wicked Game
programme.desc: A violent assault on a German tourist pits Ambassador Karla Lorenz against friends and fellow diplomats as she tries to discover who is behind this and a string of other attacks on young women in the city.

programme.title: Another Love
programme.desc: After losing her husband Michi in an accident two years ago, physiotherapist Julika starts a relationship with the easy-going bicycle city guide Konstantin. With Konstantin, life is full of lightness and adventure again, but is it really love?

programme.title: Murders in Porquerolles
programme.desc: The lifeless body of a painter is found on a beach in Porquerolles. Her body at the foot of the cliff evokes the Lycastre, the famous dragon from the legend that gave the bay its name. A rigid prosecutor and a whimsical policewoman team up to investigate.

programme.title: SAF
programme.desc: Desperate, Kamil takes a low wage job in Istanbul's urbanization project. In so doing, he displaces a Syrian refugee and partakes in his neighborhood’s destruction, while also needing to pay for the required permits. One day, Kamil suddenly disappears.

programme.title: Go Youth!
programme.desc: Four teenagers, each with unique dreams, passions, and fears, attempt to navigate through the contemporary adult world of Mexico City. The pursuit of their youthful ideals is met with setbacks along the way as we follow in their journey.

programme.title: On Our Watch
programme.desc: Arturo unsuspectingly introduces an algorithm that cost him his job, fiancée and his friends. In his loneliness, he grows attached to Stella, a hologram, who he might lose if he can’t renew his subscription. Will Arturo find love and freedom again?

programme.title: Governance
programme.desc: Renzo, a brilliant and unscrupulous manager is forced to quit his position as general manager of an oil group after an investigation for corruption. Convinced that a young colleague betrayed him, he plots his revenge, but the situation gets out of hand.

programme.title: Love Suddenly
programme.desc: Still hung up on his teenage sweetheart Marie, Jakob sets out to win her back. However, she is under the mistaken impression that he is more successful than he actually is. Soon, Jakob finds himself in a web of lies he cannot escape from.

programme.title: Traces of Sandalwood
programme.desc: Adopted and living in Spain for years, a young woman returns to Mumbai to discover her roots, accompanied by a handsome Indian guide whom she romances.

programme.title: Sleepless Night
programme.desc: A cop with a connection to the criminal underworld finds his secret life exposed when he and his partner are caught stealing cocaine from a powerful drug dealer, a move that puts his son's life in jeopardy.

programme.title: Love and Mazel Tov
programme.desc: In a bid to impress Anne, the attractive Jewish bookstore owner, Daniel pretended to be Jewish. As the lie gets out of hand, he can only hope she will continue to love him when the truth is inevitably revealed.

programme.title: Gossip
programme.desc: A junior overhears some juicy gossip, but when she attempts to retell it, she falls flat and bores her audience. Frustrated with her lacklustre storytelling skills, a group of seniors take it upon themselves to teach her the art of gossiping.

programme.title: Tokyo Fianc ée
programme.desc: A charming and tender tale of young love and cultural discovery. Amélie, a Japanophile young Belgian woman in Tokyo falls into a whirlwind romance with Rinri, a Francophile Japanese student.

programme.title: Ann
programme.desc: The real-life story of Ann Lovett, a 15-year-old Irish girl who died in childbirth in a grotto of her local church in 1984. The film revisits a tragedy that shook the nation to its core.

programme.title: I Have Electric Dreams
programme.desc: 16-year-old Eva is experiencing her sexual awakening and is desperate to leave the house she shares with her mother and younger sister and move in with her estranged father, a troubled artist who paints, sculpts, writes poetry and drinks too much.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: Fatal Alibi
programme.desc: A young motorcyclist is killed in an accident. Daniel Stokr, an employee of the Czech Ministry of Economy, is accused of being involved. Though Karla takes on the case, she is able to give him an alibi, which sends her on an uncertain trail for the truth.

programme.title: ONE Friday Fights 114
programme.desc: On June 27, ONE Friday Fights 114 takes over the iconic Lumpinee Stadium in Bangkok, Thailand, with two thrilling matchups atop the card. Headlining the event is a bantamweight Muay Thai firefight between Thailand’s Kulabdam Sor Jor Piek Uthai and Brazil’s Felipe Lobo in what promises to be a candidate for Fight of the Year. Lobo will try to protect his #3 spot in the bantamweight Muay Thai rankings against a man whose left hand has flatlined some of the best fighters in the world. If Kulabdam can finish Lobo too, he may inject himself into the rankings and inch closer to a shot at the ONE Bantamweight Muay Thai World Title. Before those two strikers light up Lumpinee Stadium, a pair of Thai legends will collide in a 140-pound Muay Thai foray. The immovable Seksan Or Kwanmuang meets elbow master Muangthai PK Saenchai for the next chapter in their longstanding rivalry. The duo have shared the ring on four occasions outside of ONE, with Seksan holding a commanding lead. Now, Muang...

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: Homicide in St. Petersburg
programme.desc: When a childhood friend accused of murder by the Russian mafia is kidnapped, Karla feels a personal connection to the case. How will she figure out the truth of the matter?

programme.title: On Our Watch
programme.desc: Arturo unsuspectingly introduces an algorithm that cost him his job, fiancée and his friends. In his loneliness, he grows attached to Stella, a hologram, who he might lose if he can’t renew his subscription. Will Arturo find love and freedom again?

programme.title: Love Suddenly
programme.desc: Still hung up on his teenage sweetheart Marie, Jakob sets out to win her back. However, she is under the mistaken impression that he is more successful than he actually is. Soon, Jakob finds himself in a web of lies he cannot escape from.

programme.title: Sleepless Night
programme.desc: A cop with a connection to the criminal underworld finds his secret life exposed when he and his partner are caught stealing cocaine from a powerful drug dealer, a move that puts his son's life in jeopardy.

programme.title: Love and Mazel Tov
programme.desc: In a bid to impress Anne, the attractive Jewish bookstore owner, Daniel pretended to be Jewish. As the lie gets out of hand, he can only hope she will continue to love him when the truth is inevitably revealed.

programme.title: Not My Type
programme.desc: A dashing philosopher is sent off to teach in a quiet northern town, where he soon falls for a bubbly and rather vulgar local hairdresser. But will the couple’s carnal affection manage to overcome their irreconcilable differences?

programme.title: Tokyo Fianc ée
programme.desc: A charming and tender tale of young love and cultural discovery. Amélie, a Japanophile young Belgian woman in Tokyo falls into a whirlwind romance with Rinri, a Francophile Japanese student.

programme.title: Submission
programme.desc: Lúcia is raped by her husband and presses charges against him. In her quest for justice, she must battle her husband who is the son of the State's Vice Attorney, and the Portuguese legal system with its patriarchal beliefs.

programme.title: Ann
programme.desc: The real-life story of Ann Lovett, a 15-year-old Irish girl who died in childbirth in a grotto of her local church in 1984. The film revisits a tragedy that shook the nation to its core.

programme.title: Summer Rebels
programme.desc: Young Jonas wants to visit his cool grandpa in Slovakia for a summer of fun, but his mom has other plans. Undeterred, Jonas takes off on an adventure of his own in this luminous and light-hearted tale of rebellion, friendship, catastrophe and redemption.

programme.title: I Have Electric Dreams
programme.desc: 16-year-old Eva is experiencing her sexual awakening and is desperate to leave the house she shares with her mother and younger sister and move in with her estranged father, a troubled artist who paints, sculpts, writes poetry and drinks too much.

programme.title: Latin For All
programme.desc: Delphine, a disillusioned Latin teacher, made a deal with her class of 5 lazy students: if they keep quiet, they’ll all receive A grades without having to learn anything. Unfortunately, this qualifies them for a Latin competition taking place in Naples.

programme.title: Future Is A Lonely Place
programme.desc: Seeking revenge for his family’s death, Frank stages a crime and turns himself in to infiltrate a prison drug ring. Frank aims to get close to the man responsible for their death, and forms a dangerous bond with a guard along the way.

programme.title: Murders in Toulouse
programme.desc: Several corpses are found scattered across Toulouse, with evidence strangely linked to a particular song’s lyrics. Captain Keller, a veteran inspector ravaged by an illness, teams up with a young officer, who has secrets of her own, to solve the case.

programme.title: Margherita Hack - The Lady Of The Stars
programme.desc: The intimate and emotional biography of Italian astrophysicist Margherita Hack, from an independent and curious child to the first female director of the Trieste Astronomical Observatory.
